definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
in touch with the common people/down-to-earth

sentences.english: The grounding wires can be fixed on case body and case door. The connecting parts can be detached.
sentences.chinese: 箱体和箱门上都可安装接地线，连接件可以卸下。

sentences.english: Kay’s argument is that many goals are best pursued obliquely.
sentences.chinese: Kay的观点是很多目标最好是被我们间接地去追逐。

sentences.english: Spring gaskets should be added to the ground points, and the connection should be fastened.
sentences.chinese: 各接地连接点应加弹簧垫片，连接紧固可靠。

sentences.english: No welding ground shall be made on the coated part of the article.
sentences.chinese: 管道涂塑的地方不允许用作焊接接地。

sentences.english: Equipped with grounding switch load switch, can withstand short-circuit current.
sentences.chinese: 配装接地开关的负荷开关，可以承受短路电流。

sentences.english: The single-phase-to-earth fault in the system takes place frequently.
sentences.chinese: 在这类系统中，发生最多的是单相接地故障。

sentences.english: Chaton brand BT - 2002 type powerful grounding resistance reduction agent committed to lightning protection of the overall program.
sentences.chinese: 型强效接地降阻剂致力于雷电防护的整体方案。

sentences.english: This machine should be earthed correct to ensure safety.
sentences.chinese: 本机必须正确接地，确保安全。
经常检查振捣器接地情况。

sentences.english: These words allude to the primal memories of Egypt and the Exodus.
sentences.chinese: 这些话语间接地回忆古远的埃及和出埃及的事件。

sentences.english: Localise the ground connection for the amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 定位放大器的接地连接。

sentences.english: Analysis of grounded overvoltage through arc at field has been also carried out.
sentences.chinese: 并对实际发生的弧光接地过电压进行了分析。

sentences.english: Before the test, all circuit connection and ground connection have to be completed correctly.
sentences.chinese: 在进行测试前确认所有电路连接和接地都已正确完成。

sentences.english: Weld the earth connecting cable on the floor net which also based on the floor system drawings.
sentences.chinese: 应根据接地系统图，在地网上焊接接地引下线。

sentences.english: Weld the earth connecting cable on the floor net which also based on the floor system drawings.
sentences.chinese: 应根据接地系统图，在地网上焊接接地引下线。

sentences.english: The resistance must BE calculated from the current and the resulting voltage drop using ohm is law.
sentences.chinese: 根据电流和测出的压降值用欧姆定律计算出接地电阻。

definition: abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
